title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Revise and expand the requirements for the SkillsMarketplace platform. This includes a comprehensive analysis of user roles, features, and functionality. The revised document will cover both functional and non-functional requirements such as performance, scalability, security, accessibility, data privacy, and any other organizational policies or constraints. Involve all relevant stakeholders (e.g., HR, legal, security) to ensure a comprehensive understanding of the platform's needs. Once complete, share with the project team for feedback before finalizing. The revised document should also include user interface design considerations, integration points with existing systems, and any potential third-party services that may be required. Upon completion, assign to the 'project-manager' for further action.

title: Design System Architecture for SkillsMarketplace
description: Design the overall system architecture for SkillsMarketplace, considering aspects such as scalability, high availability, security, performance, and maintainability. Provide a detailed architecture diagram, documentation, and ensure that the design is microservices-oriented with clear separation of concerns for frontend, backend, database, and infrastructure components. Consider implementing technologies like Kubernetes for orchestration, GraphQL/REST APIs for communication between services, and serverless functions where appropriate. In addition, suggest potential candidate technologies for each component that are well-suited to the project requirements, such as React for frontend, Node.js with Express.js for backend, MongoDB for NoSQL database, and AWS Lambda for serverless functions.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the user interface and frontend components for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend services, APIs, and business logic for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema and data models for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Implement security measures, authentication, and access controls for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configure a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create user guides, technical documentation, and other supporting materials for the SkillsMarketplace platform.

title: Conduct Testing
description: Plan and execute various testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing.

title: Deploy to Production
description: Deploy the SkillsMarketplace platform to the production environment and perform final testing and validation.
